DOC.brief_summary: The investigators want to demonstrate that a new organization with telemedicine could rationalize the treatment pathway of patient suffering from rare skin disease. A diagnosis and a personalised treatment pathway could be performed before the consultation in the hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Rationalization of the Treatment Pathway of Patient Suffering From Rare Skin Disease With Telemedicine
DOC.criteria: New patients suffering from a rare skin disease whatever pathology or age, which needs a takeover by this centre Or patients already takeover by the centre but lost to followup for more than one year Patients (and/or parents) who give their consents Patients (and/or parents) able to fill in questionnaires Pregnant or breastfeeding women. Patients subject to a judicial safeguard order Patients who need an emergency takeover Patients followed by a doctor who does not have a computerized system or refuse to send data via the secured messaging
